actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend section 4349(a) of title 10, United States Code, to provide that the companies of the corps of cadets at the U.S. Military Academy may be commanded by commissioned officers of the Army, Navy, Air Force, or Marine Corps.

summary.text: Authorizes commissioned officers of the Navy, Air Force, and Marine Corps to command companies of the Corps of Cadets at the United States Military Academy.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 4349(a) of title 10, United States Code, to provide that the companies of the corps of cadets at the U.S. Military Academy may be commanded by commissioned officers of the Army, Navy, Air Force, or Marine Corps.
